alert.note: Alert for Brown; Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 9:55PM CDT until May 19 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Brown County in west central Texas... East central Coleman County in west central Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 954 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grosvenor, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Grosvenor around 1010 PM CDT. Lake Brownwood around 1020 PM CDT. Byrds around 1040 PM CDT. Lake Brownwood State Park around 1045 PM CDT. May around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Owens. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
